In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the diced onion and cook until translucent.
Add the diced carrots and celery to the skillet and cook for a few minutes until they begin to soften.
Stir in the all-purpose flour, salt, black pepper, and dried thyme. Cook for another minute to cook off the raw flour taste.
Gradually pour in the chicken broth and milk, stirring constantly to prevent lumps. Cook until the mixture thickens and comes to a simmer.
Add the cooked chicken, frozen peas, and frozen corn to the skillet. Stir to combine and remove from heat.
Roll out one of the pie crusts and place it in the bottom of a 9-inch pie dish. Pour the chicken and vegetable mixture over the crust.
Cover the filling with the second pie crust. Trim any excess dough and crimp the edges to seal. Cut a few slits on the top crust to allow steam to escape.
Bake the chicken pot pie in the preheated oven for about 30 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
Allow the pot pie to cool for a few minutes before serving. Enjoy the comforting flavors of this classic dish!

recipes.name: Fish Tacos
recipes.description: A delicious and refreshing Mexican dish consisting of crispy battered fish, topped with tangy slaw and served in warm tortillas.
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine the shredded cabbage, sliced red onion, chopped cilantro, lime juice, mayonnaise, and sour cream. Toss well to coat. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Set aside to let the flavors meld.
In a shallow dish, whisk together the all-purpose flour, cornstarch, baking powder, salt, and black pepper.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the beer and egg. Gradually pour the wet mixture into the dry mixture, whisking until smooth and well combined.

Pat the fish fillets dry with paper towels. Dip each fillet into the batter, allowing any excess to drip off. Fry the battered fish in hot oil until golden brown and crispy, about 3-4 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towels to drain excess oil.
Warm the tortillas in a dry skillet or in the oven until pliable.
To assemble the fish tacos, place a few pieces of fried fish on each tortilla. Top with a generous spoonful of the slaw and garnish with additional cilantro leaves and a squeeze of lime juice.
Serve the fish tacos immediately, and enjoy the delightful combination of flavors and textures!
ingredients: 1 pound white fish fillets (such as cod or tilapia)

recipes.name: Cobb Salad
recipes.description: A hearty American salad featuring a mix of fresh greens, grilled chicken, bacon, avocado, tomatoes, hard-boiled eggs, blue cheese, and a tangy dressing.
instructions: In a large salad bowl, arrange a bed of fresh greens.
Grill or cook the chicken until fully cooked, then slice it into strips.
Place the grilled chicken, bacon, avocado, tomatoes, hard-boiled eggs, and crumbled blue cheese over the greens in neat rows.
In a small bowl, whisk together the dressing ingredients until well combined.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad, or serve it on the side.
Toss the salad just before serving to coat the ingredients with the dressing.
Serve the Cobb salad as a filling and delicious main course.

recipes.name: Apple Pie
recipes.description: A classic American dessert made with a flaky pastry crust and a sweet and spiced apple filling.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
Prepare the pie crust by rolling out the pastry dough and lining a pie dish with one of the pastry sheets.
In a large bowl, combine the sliced apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon juice. Toss until the apples are well coated.
Pour the apple mixture into the prepared pie crust, distributing it evenly.
Cover the filling with the second sheet of pastry dough. Trim any excess dough and crimp the edges to seal.
Cut a few slits on the top crust to allow steam to escape during baking.
Place the pie on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.
Reduce the oven temperature to 375°F (190°C) and continue baking for another 35-40 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
Remove the pie from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack for at least 1 hour before serving.
Serve the apple pie warm or at room temperature, and optionally, top it with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a dollop of whipped cream.
ingredients: 6 cups peeled, cored, and sliced apples (about 6 medium-sized apples)

recipes.name: Texas-style Chili
recipes.description: A hearty and spicy chili made with tender chunks of beef, aromatic spices, and rich tomato sauce. Perfect for a comforting meal.
instructions: In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat the oil over medium heat.
Add the diced onions and minced garlic to the pot. Cook until the onions are translucent and the garlic is fragrant.
Add the ground beef to the pot. Cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned and cooked through.
Stir in the chili powder, cumin, paprika, oregano, salt, and cayenne pepper. Cook for 1-2 minutes to toast the spices.
Pour in the beef broth and crushed tomatoes. Stir well to combine.
Add the kidney beans, tomato paste, and brown sugar. Stir again.
Bring the chili to a boil, then reduce the heat to low. Cover and simmer for 2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Taste and adjust the seasoning if needed.
Serve the Texas-style chili hot, garnished with shredded cheese, diced onions, and a dollop of sour cream.
Enjoy with cornbread or crackers!
ingredients: 1 can (15 ounces) kidney beans, drained and rinsed
Shredded cheese, diced onions, and sour cream, for garnish

recipes.name: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.description: A classic Italian-American dish featuring breaded and fried chicken cutlets topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
In a shallow bowl, whisk the eggs. In another shallow bowl, combine the bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, dried basil, dried oregano, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Dip each chicken cutlet into the beaten eggs, then coat it with the bread crumb mixture, pressing gently to adhere the crumbs.

Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the breaded chicken cutlets and cook until golden brown on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side. Remove from the skillet and place on a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil.
Spread a thin layer of marinara sauce on the bottom of a baking dish. Place the cooked chicken cutlets on top of the sauce.
Spoon marinara sauce over each chicken cutlet, covering them completely. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella and grated Parmesan cheese over the sauce.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves, if desired.
Serve the Chicken Parmesan hot with pasta or a side salad.
Enjoy!

recipes.name: Reuben Sandwich
recipes.description: A classic American sandwich made with corned beef, Swiss cheese, sauerkraut, and Russian dressing, grilled between slices of rye bread.
instructions: Preheat a skillet or griddle over medium heat.
Spread Russian dressing on one side of each slice of rye bread.
Layer corned beef, Swiss cheese, and sauerkraut on one slice of bread.
Top with the second slice of bread, dressing-side down.
Place the sandwich in the preheated skillet or griddle and cook until the bread is toasted and the cheese is melted, about 3-4 minutes per side.
Remove the sandwich from the skillet and cut it in half diagonally.
Serve the Reuben Sandwich hot with pickles or potato chips.
Enjoy!

cocktails.name: The Real Mojito
cocktails.description: The Real Mojito recipe is a classic Cuban cocktail made with fresh mint leaves, lime wedges, sugar, white rum, ice, and club soda. This refreshing drink is perfect for hot summer days or for enjoying with friends at a party.
instructions: Place mint leaves and 1 lime wedge into a sturdy glass. Crush to release mint oils and lime juice.
Add remaining lime wedges and 2 tablespoons sugar, and muddle again to release the lime juice. Do not strain the mixture.
Fill the glass almost to the top with ice.
Pour in rum and fill the glass with club soda.
Stir, taste, and add more sugar if desired.
ingredients: 1/2 medium lime, cut into 3 wedges, divided
2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste
1 cup ice cubes, or as needed
1/2 cup club soda, or as needed

cocktails.name: Strawberry Mojito
cocktails.description: Take your mojito game to the next level with this Strawberry Mojito recipe. Make a big batch for your next summer gathering and get ready to impress your guests!
instructions: Pour about 1/2 inch of sugar onto a small, shallow plate. Run a lime wedge around the rims of 8 cocktail glasses, then dip the rims into sugar to coat; set aside.

Squeeze all of the lime wedges into a sturdy glass pitcher. Toss juiced limes into the pitcher along with mint, strawberries, and 1 cup sugar. Crush with a muddler to release strawberry juice and mint oil. Stir in club soda and rum until sugar has dissolved.
Pour into the prepared glasses over ice cubes to serve.

cocktails.name: Pineapple Mojito
cocktails.description: Bring a taste of the tropics to your next happy hour with this Pineapple Mojito recipe.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves, sugar, and pineapple in a highball glass.
Fill glass with ice cubes. Pour in pineapple juice and rum. Top with a splash of club soda. Garnish with pineapple wedge and remaining mint leaves.

cocktails.name: Watermelon Mojitos
cocktails.description: Watermelon Mojitos are a refreshing twist on the classic mojito perfect for a hot summer day.
instructions: Place watermelon cubes into a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into a bowl through a mesh strainer to remove pulp. Measure 2 cups strained watermelon juice and set aside.
Place mint leaves into the bottom of a pitcher. Pour in 1/2 of the watermelon juice; muddle mint leaves with a muddler or the bottom of a wooden spoon.
Pour in remaining watermelon juice, lime juice, rum, and simple syrup. Fill the pitcher with ice and top with club soda. Serve.
ingredients: 2 cups ice cubes, or as needed
1 cup club soda, or as needed

cocktails.name: Fresh Raspberry Mojito
cocktails.description: Indulge in the sweet and tart flavors of fresh raspberries, perfectly balanced with the cool, minty taste of this classic cocktail.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves, raspberries, simple syrup, and lime juice together in a shaker.
Fill the shaker with ice and add vodka and rum; cover and shake until chilled.
Pour entire contents of shaker into a Collins glass and top with club soda.

cocktails.name: Dragon Fruit Mojito
cocktails.description: Experience the exotic flavor of dragon fruit with this refreshing Dragon Fruit Mojito recipe, perfect for sipping on a warm summer day!
instructions: Mix 2 tablespoons plus 2 teaspoons sugar with mint in the bottom of a highball glass.
Combine rum and dragon fruit flesh in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour rum mixture over the muddled mint mixture. Stir to incorporate.
Divide mixture between 4 double old-fashioned glasses. Top each drink with equal amounts of club soda.
ingredients: 1 dragon fruit, halved and flesh removed

cocktails.name: Mojiteas
cocktails.description: Perfect for hot summer days, this delightful drink combines the classic flavors of a mojito with a crisp and cooling iced tea twist.
instructions: Place tea bags and mint sprigs into a large pitcher. Pour in boiling water; steep for 8 to 10 minutes.
Remove tea bags and mint; before discarding, squeeze excess tea back into pitcher.
Stir in sugar until dissolved; add orange juice and lemon juice.
Pour in cold water and rum.
Refrigerate at least 4 hours to overnight.
ingredients: 3 cups cold water, or more to taste
1 cup light rum, or more to taste

cocktails.name: Minty Mango Mojito
cocktails.description: Looking for a refreshing twist on the classic mojito? Try this Minty Mango Mojito! With fresh mango, coconut rum, and a homemade mint simple syrup, this tropical cocktail is the perfect balance of sweet and tangy.
instructions: Combine water and sugar in a small pot over medium heat. Whisk until sugar dissolves in the water. Add 12 mint leaves. Bring to a boil and whisk for 1 minute.
Remove from heat and let cool, about 30 minutes.
Place lime and 12 mint leaves in a glass; mash together with a muddler to extract flavors. Add fresh mango; muddle until combined.
Stir in 2 tablespoons of the mint simple syrup.
Stir in coconut rum.
Fill glass with ice and top with club soda.
ingredients: 12 fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
1/8 fresh mango, peeled and cubed, or more to taste
1 1/2 fluid ounces coconut-flavored rum, or more to taste

cocktails.name: Guava Mojito
cocktails.description: This refreshing cocktail is a tropical twist on the classic mojito.
instructions: Fill a glass with ice.
Muddle 3 sprigs mint and sugar together in a cocktail shaker.
Add ice, rum, lime juice, and guava nectar.
Cover and shake 10 times.
Strain drink into glass filled with ice.
Add club soda and garnish with 1 mint sprig.
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces club soda, or as needed

cocktails.name: Patron Mojito
cocktails.description: Experience the bold and refreshing taste of silver tequila perfectly paired with the cool mint and citrusy lime in this classic Patron Mojito cocktail.
instructions: Combine tequila, mint, sugar, and lime in a tall glass.
Mash mint and lime well with a cocktail muddler.
Top with club soda and stir gently to serve.
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces silver tequila, preferably Patron
1/4 cup club soda, or as needed

cocktails.name: Vodka Martini
cocktails.description: Savor the classic and sophisticated taste of this Vodka Martini, made with premium vodka and a hint of dry vermouth. Garnished with three olives, it's the perfect cocktail for any occasion.
instructions: Combine vodka and dry vermouth in a cocktail mixing glass. Fill with ice and stir until chilled.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with three olives on a toothpick.

cocktails.name: Pumpkin Spice Martini
cocktails.description: Satisfy your fall cravings with this creamy and delicious Pumpkin Spice Martini.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice
Pour vanilla-flavored vodka, Irish cream liqueur, and pumpkin-flavored liqueur over ice. Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted
Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with ground cinnamon and ground nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Espresso Martini
cocktails.description: Savor the bold and rich flavors of espresso, coffee liqueur, and creme de cacao, all perfectly blended with vodka in this classic Espresso Martini.
instructions: Pour vodka, coffee liqueur, crème de cacao, and espresso into a cocktail shaker; add ice, cover and shake until chilled.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce white creme de cacao

cocktails.name: Cosmo-Style Pomegranate Martini
cocktails.description: Add a touch of sweetness to your evening with the Cosmo-Style Pomegranate Martini! Made with citron vodka, pomegranate juice, Cointreau, and lemon juice, this cocktail is a refreshing and delicious choice.
instructions: Fill a shaker with ice.
Pour vodka, pomegranate juice, Cointreau, and lemon juice over ice in the cocktail shaker. Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce cointreau or other orange liqueur

cocktails.name: Cranberry Martini
cocktails.description: Looking for a sweet and tangy drink to enjoy with friends? Look no further than this Cranberry Martini!
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add cranberry juice, vodka, orange liqueur, and vermouth. Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted.
Strain into 2 chilled glasses and garnish with cranberries.
ingredients: 1 cup ice cubes, or as needed

cocktails.name: Grapefruit Martini
cocktails.description: This Grapefruit Martini is a perfect balance of sweet and tart, with a touch of sophistication.
instructions: Pour sugar onto a small plate. Wet the rim of a martini glass with cold water, then dip into sugar to coat.
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, then pour in grapefruit juice, vodka, and triple sec.
Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into the prepared glass.

cocktails.name: Lemon Drop Martini
cocktails.description: Sip on sunshine with this classic Lemon Drop Martini recipe! With tangy citrus flavors, a sugared rim, and a touch of sweet and sour mix, this refreshing cocktail is perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Moisten the edges of a martini glass with a little lime juice, and then dip moistened edges into sugar. Place lemon zest strip in glass.
Combine vodka, lime juice, sweet and sour mix, and ice in a shaker.
Shake vigorously, and strain into a martini glass.

cocktails.name: Watermelon Martini
cocktails.description: Sip on a refreshing Watermelon Martini, perfect for a summer evening. It's the perfect drink to cool off with on a hot day.
instructions: Combine salt and sugar in a small bowl and pour onto a small, shallow plate. Moisten the rims of 2 glasses with a piece of watermelon and dip the moistened glass rims into the salt and sugar mixture; set aside.
Pour watermelon juice, vodka, watermelon schnapps, simple syrup, and lime juice into a cocktail shaker over ice.
Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted.
Strain into the prepared glasses.

cocktails.name: Pineapple Martini
cocktails.description: Sip on a taste of the tropics with this refreshing Pineapple Martini! Made with pineapple juice, vodka, lime juice, and triple sec, this cocktail is the perfect balance of sweet and tart. Shake it up and transport yourself to a sunny beach getaway.
instructions: Fill a chilled martini glass or cocktail shaker with ice.
Add pineapple juice, vodka, lime juice, and triple sec.
Shake vigorously if using a cocktail shaker, or stir in the glass until well combined.
ingredients: 1 cup ice cubes, or as needed

cocktails.name: Bikini Martini
cocktails.description: Escape to a tropical paradise with the Bikini Martini! This frothy blend of coconut rum, vodka, and pineapple juice is the perfect vacation in a glass, topped off with a splash of grenadine and a vibrant orange garnish.
instructions: Combine rum, vodka and pineapple juice in a drink shaker.
Shake firmly until frothy.
Pour in a martini glass, add a touch of grenadine in the middle.
Garnish with an orange wheel.

cocktails.name: Apple Martini
cocktails.description: Get a crisp and refreshing taste of fall with this Apple Martini recipe. Made with vodka, apple schnapps, and a touch of lemon-lime soda, this cocktail is perfect for any occasion. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry to take your drink to the next level.

cocktails.name: Spicy Watermelon Margarita
cocktails.description: Looking for a refreshing and spicy twist on a classic margarita? Try this Spicy Watermelon Margarita recipe! Made with fresh watermelon puree, jalapeno, and a splash of orange liqueur, it's the perfect cocktail for summer sipping.
instructions: Puree watermelon in a blender. Wipe the rim of a margarita glass with a lime wedge; dip rim in salt.
In a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice, add tequila, orange liqueur, lime juice, jalapeño, and 2 ounces of the watermelon puree. Shake until very cold.
Strain into prepared glass. Garnish with watermelon wedge and jalapeño slice.
ingredients: 1 thinly sliced jalapeno slice, plus more for garnish

cocktails.name: Easy Mango Margaritas
cocktails.description: Get ready for a tropical getaway with these refreshing and easy-to-make mango margaritas. Perfect for any occasion, these margaritas are a delicious twist on a classic cocktail.
instructions: Combine ice, margarita mix, tequila, and mango nectar in a blender; squeeze 1 lime half into the blender. Blend until cocktail is smooth.
Cut remaining lime half into wedges.
Pour 1/4 to 1/2 inch of sugar onto a small, shallow plate.
Moisten rims of 4 glasses with a wedge of lime, dip the moistened glasses into sugar.
Pour cocktail into the prepared glasses.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon white sugar or as needed

cocktails.name: Real Margaritas
cocktails.description: Satisfy your margarita cravings with this easy and authentic recipe that uses real ingredients for a perfectly refreshing and zesty drink. With just four simple ingredients, you can whip up a batch of margaritas that will have your taste buds singing in no time!
instructions: Fill blender with crushed ice. Pour in limeade concentrate, tequila, and triple sec.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve.
ingredients: 4 cups crushed ice, or as needed

cocktails.name: Blood Orange Margarita
cocktails.description: This Blood Orange Margarita adds a refreshing twist to the classic cocktail. The combination of tequila, triple sec, sparkling water, blood orange juice, and lime juice creates a sweet, tart, and fizzy drink that's perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Combine tequila, triple sec, sparkling water, blood orange juice, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice.
Shake well and strain into chilled margarita glasses.
ingredients: 2 1/2 fluid ounces blood orange sparkling water

cocktails.name: Pineapple Margarita
cocktails.description: Get whisked away to a tropical paradise with this refreshing Pineapple Margarita! This cocktail features a delicious blend of pineapple juice, tequila, triple sec, and lime juice, served in a salt-rimmed glass for a perfect balance of sweet and salty. With a garnish of fresh pineapple and lime wedges, every sip will transport you to a beachside getaway.
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker half-full with ice.
Add pineapple juice, tequila, triple sec, and lime juice to the shaker. Seal and shake vigorously until outside is frosted, 10 to 15 seconds.
Sprinkle salt onto a plate. Moisten the rim of a glass with a lime wedge. Press the moistened rim into the salt. Fill glass with ice.
Strain margarita into the glass and garnish with pineapple and lime wedge, if desired.
ingredients: 3/4 fluid ounce freshly squeezed lime juice
1 tablespoon coarse salt, or as needed

cocktails.name: Frozen Strawberry Margarita
cocktails.description: Cool off with a refreshing and fruity twist on a classic cocktail with this Frozen Strawberry Margarita recipe,  it's the perfect drink to beat the heat.
instructions: Fill blender with ice cubes, Pulse until crushed
Pour in tequila and triple sec, then add strawberries and limeade concentrate.
Blend until smooth, about 30 seconds. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 cups ice cubes, or as needed

cocktails.name: Prickly Pear Cactus Margarita
cocktails.description: Experience the flavors of the Southwest with this refreshing Prickly Pear Cactus Margarita. Made with tequila, lime juice, triple sec, and a touch of sweet prickly pear syrup, this margarita is both tangy and sweet with a hint of earthy cactus.
instructions: Pour salt onto a small plate. Wet the rim of a margarita glass and dip rim into salt.
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice; pour tequila, sweet and sour mix, triple sec, lime juice, and pear syrup over ice.
Cover shaker and shake drink; strain into prepared margarita glass.
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces sweet and sour mix

cocktails.name: Jalapeño Margaritas
cocktails.description: Spice up your happy hour with these Jalapeño Margaritas!
instructions: Pour salt onto a small, shallow plate. Moisten rim of glasses with water and dip into salt, fill with ice and set aside.
Fill a shaker with ice. Pour tequila, triple sec, lime juice, agave nectar, and jalapeño into the shaker. Cover and shake vigorously until the outside of the shaker has frosted.
Strain into the prepared glasses. Garnish with lime wedges to serve.

cocktails.name: Jalapeño and Cucumber Margarita
cocktails.description: Cool down this summer with a Jalapeño and Cucumber Margarita! Infused with spicy jalapeño and crisp cucumber, this refreshing cocktail is perfect for sipping on a hot day.
instructions: Stir tequila, lime juice, orange liqueur, and simple syrup together in a pitcher with a lid
Add jalapeño pepper and thin cucumber slices. Refrigerate at least 1 hour.
Run a wedge of lime along the rim of each of four pint glasses. Spread kosher salt onto a flat plate; press glass rims into salt to coat.
Fill glass with ice and pour margarita over the ice.
Garnish with cucumber slice.
ingredients: 1/2 cup tequila, or more to taste
4 thin slice cucumber, or more to taste
2 tablespoons kosher salt, or as needed

cocktails.name: Blue Lagoon Margarita
cocktails.description: The Blue Lagoon Margarita is a refreshing and vibrant cocktail that combines the flavors of tequila, pineapple juice, sour mix, blue curacao, and lime juice, served over ice for a tropical twist on the classic margarita.
ingredients: 1 cup ice, or more if desired

cocktails.name: Strawberry Daiquiri
cocktails.description: Satisfy your sweet tooth with this fruity and refreshing daiquiri that blends together frozen strawberries, rum, and lemon-lime soda.
instructions: Place frozen strawberries in a blender; add sugar, lemon juice, and lime juice.
Pour in rum and lemon-lime beverage, then add ice. Blend until smooth.
Pour into glass.

cocktails.name: Mixed Fruit Daiquiri
cocktails.description: Escape to the tropics with every sip of this Mixed Fruit Daiquiri. A refreshing blend of frozen strawberry daiquiri mixer, fresh apple, juicy pineapple, sweet mango, and tangy orange, all mixed with white rum and a splash of lime juice. Perfect for a summer afternoon or a relaxing evening by the pool.
instructions: Blend ice and strawberry daiquiri mixer together in a blender until smooth.
Add apple, pineapple, mango, orange, and lime juice; blend until smooth.
Pour rum into daiquiri mixture and blend well.
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) cans frozen strawberry daiquiri mixer

cocktails.name: Pineapple Mango Daiquiri
cocktails.description: Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with every sip of this Pineapple Mango Daiquiri. Sweet mango nectar and pineapple juice blend with a potent combination of rum and triple sec to create a slushy, icy concoction that's bursting with fruity flavors. Squeeze in some lime juice for a refreshing zing.
instructions: Pour mango nectar, pineapple juice, rum, triple sec, and lime juice into a blender and pulse once or twice to combine.
Add ice cubes and blend until drink is slushy and no ice chunks remain, 1 to 2 minutes.
Serve in a glass with additional ice if desired.
ingredients: 2 cups ice cubes, or as desired

cocktails.name: Orange Pineapple Smoothie
cocktails.description: This Orange Pineapple Smoothie is like a vacation in a glass! With sweet pineapple, tangy orange juice, and a hint of rum, it's the perfect way to relax and unwind.
instructions: In a blender, combine pineapple, orange juice concentrate with juice, rum, sugar, lime juice and ice cubes.
Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses, garnish with cherries, and serve.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can of pineapple chunks, undrained
1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate

cocktails.name: Frozen Lime Daquiri
cocktails.description: Looking for a refreshing and tangy cocktail? Try this Frozen Lime Daiquiri, made with limeade concentrate, rum, and ice cubes blended together until smooth. Perfect for a hot summer day or a relaxing evening with friends. Serve immediately and enjoy the cool, crisp flavors!
instructions: In a blender, combine limeade concentrate, rum and ice cubes.
Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen limeade concentrate

cocktails.name: Fresh Banana Daiquiri
cocktails.description: Indulge in the creamy and fruity flavors of this Fresh Banana Daiquiri, and let it transport you to a lush tropical paradise.
instructions: Combine banana, rum, lime juice, triple sec, and sugar in a blender; purée until smooth.
Add ice cubes and blend on the highest setting until slushy, 15 to 20 seconds. Pour into a glass and serve.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste

cocktails.name: Winter Daiquiri
cocktails.description: The Winter Daiquiri is a sophisticated twist on the classic daiquiri, perfect for sipping by a warm fire on a chilly evening. With a blend of Banks 5 Island rum and Cruzan black strap rum, this cocktail is complex and rich, offering notes of caramel and molasses.
instructions: Add the Banks 5 Island rum, Cruzan black strap rum, lime juice and simple syrup into a cocktail shaker with ice, and shake until well-chilled.
Strain into glass.
Garnish.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce Cruzan black strap rum

cocktails.name: Hemingway Daiquiri
cocktails.description: The Hemingway Daiquiri is a sophisticated take on the classic cocktail, named after the famous writer who was known for his love of strong drinks.
instructions: Add the rum, maraschino liqueur, lime juice and grapefruit juice into a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled.
Strain into a glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Deadbeat Daiquiri
cocktails.description: The Deadbeat Daiquiri is a sweet and creamy tropical delight that will transport you to a Caribbean paradise.
instructions: Blend all of the ingredients in a blender with 1.5 cups crushed ice for up to 20 seconds until frappéd.
Pour, unstrained, into a glass.
Garnish with pineapple wedge.
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces Caña Brava 7-year-old grand reserve añeja rum
1/4 ounce Rhum Clément Mahina Coco liqueur
4 whole lychee nuts, shelled (drained if canned)
1 dash Fee Brothers Aztec chocolate bitters

cocktails.name: Spiced Pear Old-Fashioned
cocktails.description: The Spiced Pear Old-Fashioned is a sophisticated and balanced drink that is perfect for any occasion, especially for those who love the classic flavors of bourbon but want to try something new and exciting.
instructions: Muddle chopped pear, 1 rosemary sprig, lemon twist, maple syrup, and bitters in a cocktail shaker with a muddler or the handle of a wooden spoon until pear is liquified.
Add bourbon, ginger liqueur, and 1 cup ice to the cocktail shaker. Cover and shake until well chilled.
Place large ice cube into the rocks glass and set a small fine sieve over the glass.
Strain the drink through the cocktail shaker top and the sieve to catch any large pieces of pulp or rosemary. Top with club soda.
Garnish with pear wedge and rosemary sprig.

cocktails.name: Classic Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: The Classic Old Fashioned is a timeless cocktail that has been enjoyed for decades. This simple yet sophisticated cocktail is a perfect balance of sweet and bitter flavors.
instructions: Pour simple syrup, water, and bitters into a whiskey glass; stir to combine.
Add ice cubes and pour in bourbon.
Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: The John Collins Cocktail
cocktails.description: The John Collins Cocktail is a refreshing burst of citrus and bourbon that will make you feel like you're sipping a cool breeze on a hot summer day, this cocktail is sure to transport you to a state of pure bliss.
instructions: Combine bourbon, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker.
Add 1 cup ice, cover, and shake until chilled. Strain into a Collins glass.
Add 1 cup ice, fill with club soda, and stir.
Garnish with orange and lemon slices and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Maker's Mark Old Fashioned
cocktails.description: This simple yet elegant cocktail combines the rich, smooth flavor of Maker's Mark® Bourbon with a hint of sweetness and a touch of citrus for a truly satisfying sipping experience.
instructions: Muddle sugar, bitters, orange, cherry, and water in an old-fashioned glass.
Remove the orange rind and fill the glass 3/4 full of ice.
Add Maker's Mark®  Bourbon and stir.

cocktails.name: Bourbon Slush
cocktails.description: Sipping on this Bourbon Slush is like taking a trip to the tropics, with every sip transporting you to a sunny beach in paradise.
instructions: Mix together pineapple juice, tea, whiskey, sugar, lemonade concentrate, and orange juice concentrate in a large bowl or container
Pour into shallow bowls or dishes. Freeze for 8 hours to overnight.
Remove frozen mixture from the freezer and let stand at room temperature for about 10 minutes.
Chop with a wire whisk or potato masher to make a slushy consistency. Place scoops of frozen slush into glasses. Top each off with lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.description: Indulge in the classic and sophisticated Manhattan cocktail, a bourbon-based drink that has been a staple in bars for over a century.
instructions: Place ice into a shaker.
Pour bourbon and vermouth over ice; shake well.
Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.description: Indulge in the perfect balance of sweet and sour with this classic Whiskey Sour recipe. The smooth, rich flavors of 100-proof bourbon whiskey are perfectly complemented by the tangy and refreshing taste of freshly squeezed lemon juice.
instructions: Prepare simple syrup: Bring sugar and water to a simmer in a small pan over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until sugar is dissolved. Pour into a small bowl and let cool completely before using, 15 to 20 minutes.
Make cocktail: Pour 3/4 fluid ounce simple syrup, bourbon, lemon juice, bitters, and egg white into a large cocktail shaker.
Cover with a smaller cocktail shaker, or top, and give cocktail a 'dry shake' without ice, about 30 seconds.
Add 3 ice cubes to bourbon mixture, cover, and shake vigorously until the shaker is very cold and the outside is frosty, about 45 seconds.
Uncover and strain into a rocks glass containing 1 large ice cube.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce freshly squeezed lemon juice
4 drops orange butters, or more to taste

cocktails.name: Jim Beam Black Hot Toddy
cocktails.description: The Jim Beam Black Hot Toddy is a warm and soothing bourbon-based cocktail that is perfect for cold winter nights or when you're feeling under the weather.
instructions: Put bourbon, lemon juice, and honey in a 6-ounce mug.
Top off with hot water and stir until honey is dissolved.
Garnish with a lemon peel (optional).

cocktails.name: Simple Mint Julep
cocktails.description: This refreshing and easy-to-make cocktail is a classic Southern drink that's perfect for a hot summer day. Whether you're enjoying it at a barbecue, a picnic, or just sitting on your porch, this drink will transport you to the lazy days of the South, where life is sweet and simple.
instructions: Place a tall glass in the freezer until frosted.
Mix water and sugar together in the frosted glass until sugar is dissolved. Twist mint leaves to release the scent and flavor from each leaf; add to glass.
Fill the glass 1/4-full with bourbon; add ice.
Garnish the glass with mint leaf.
ingredients: 5 fresh mint leaves, or to taste
1 1/2 fluid ounce bourbon, or more to taste

cocktails.name: Cider-Bourbon Thermos Cocktail
cocktails.description: The Cider-Bourbon Thermos Cocktail is a warm and cozy drink that's perfect for chilly autumn evenings. The tea and spices add depth and complexity to the drink, while the bourbon gives it a warm and satisfying kick.
instructions: Bring cider and maple syrup just to a boil in a saucepan. Remove from heat.
Add tea bags, ginger, and cardamom. Let stand, covered, for 5 minutes.
Remove and discard tea bags and spices. Stir in bourbon and lemon juice.
Transfer to a warmed 32- to 40-ounce thermos.

cocktails.name: Boulevardier Cocktail
cocktails.description: The Boulevardier Cocktail is a classic bourbon-based drink with a bitter twist. This sophisticated cocktail is made by combining bourbon whiskey, sweet vermouth, and Campari, which is then stirred over ice and strained into a lowball glass.
instructions: Combine the bourbon whiskey, sweet vermouth, and Campari in a mixing glass. Fill the mixing glass with 1 handful ice and stir continuously for 30 seconds
Add ice to a lowball glass, and strain the drink into the glass.

Use a knife to remove a 1″ wide strip of the orange peel. Squeeze the orange peel into the drink to release the oils. Gently run the peel around the edge of the glass, then place it in the glass and serve.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce sweet or semi-sweet red vermouth

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail
cocktails.description: This cocktail is perfect for any occasion, whether it's a fancy dinner party or a night out with friends. The tangy and slightly sweet flavor makes it a refreshing choice for warm weather, but it's also great any time of year.
instructions: Combine vodka, lime juice, triple sec, and cranberry juice in a cocktail shaker.
Add ice, cover and shake until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Watermelon Cosmo
cocktails.description: The Watermelon Cosmo is a refreshing twist on the classic cosmopolitan cocktail, featuring fresh watermelon juice and vodka, with a hint of lime for a citrusy kick.
instructions: Blend watermelon in a blender until smooth; strain through a fine mesh strainer and discard pulp.
Pour strained watermelon juice, and vodka into a cocktail shaker filled with ice; strain into a glass.
Squeeze lime juice into the cocktail.

cocktails.name: Peach Cosmo
cocktails.description: The Peach Cosmo is a fruity twist on the classic Cosmopolitan cocktail. With the addition of peach schnapps, this drink has a sweet and tangy flavor that's perfect for summer sipping.
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add cranberry juice, vodka, schnapps, and lime juice.
Cover and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted.
Strain into a chilled martini glass to serve.

cocktails.name: Pineapple Hurricane
cocktails.description: The Pineapple Hurricane is a tropical and refreshing cocktail that is perfect for warm weather. Made with a blend of light and dark rum, amaretto liqueur, orange juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice, and a dash of grenadine, this cocktail has a sweet and fruity flavor with a hint of nuttiness from the amaretto.
instructions: Fill a 16 ounce glass with ice.
Pour in amaretto, light rum and dark rum.
Pour in orange juice, pineapple juice, and lemon juice.
Stir, then top with a dash of grenadine and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Texas Hurricane
cocktails.description: The Texas Hurricane is a fruity and potent cocktail with a variety of liquors and juices, including rum, coconut rum, vodka, gin, triple sec, orange juice, pineapple juice, and grenadine.
instructions: Fill a hurricane glass with ice.
Pour in the rum, coconut rum, vodka, gin, triple sec, orange juice, pineapple juice, and grenadine.
Stir well with a bar spoon, then pour the 151 rum over the back of the spoon to float the liquor on top of the drink.
Garnish the glass with orange, lime, and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule with Ginger Beer
cocktails.description: A classic Moscow mule made with ginger beer for a spicy kick.
cocktails.source: The Moscow Mule is a classic cocktail that originated in the United States in the 1940s, and it has since become a popular drink around the world. The addition of ginger beer gives this version of the cocktail a spicy kick.
instructions: Fill a copper mug with ice.
Add vodka and lime juice.
Top with ginger beer.
Stir to combine.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Margarita with a Twist
cocktails.description: A classic margarita with a twist of fresh grapefruit juice for a tangy kick.
cocktails.source: Sip on a refreshing twist to the classic margarita with this tangy and flavorful concoction!
instructions: In a shaker, combine tequila, triple sec, grapefruit juice, lime juice, and ice.
Shake until well-chilled.
Rim a margarita glass with salt, if desired.
Strain the drink into the glass.
Garnish with a grapefruit wedge.

cocktails.name: Classic Negroni
cocktails.description: A classic negroni made with gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari.
cocktails.source: Sip on the bold and bitter flavors of a classic Negroni, made with gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari, and garnished with an orange twist.
instructions: Fill a mixing glass with ice.
Add gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari.
Stir until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Classic Piña Colada
cocktails.description: A classic piña colada made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice.
cocktails.source: Escape to a tropical paradise with this classic piña colada, this drink is perfect for any summertime gathering or a relaxing night in.
instructions: In a blender, combine rum, coconut cream, pineapple juice, and ice.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a tall glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Classic Moscow Mule
cocktails.description: Take a trip back to the 1940s with the Classic Moscow Mule. This timeless cocktail is made with crisp vodka, zesty lime juice, and fiery ginger beer, all served up in a signature copper mug. With each sip, you'll feel like you're transported to a bygone era of glamour and sophistication. So sit back, relax, and enjoy the refreshing tang of this iconic drink.
instructions: Fill a copper mug with ice.
Add vodka and lime juice.
Top with ginger beer.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Classic Bloody Mary
cocktails.description: A classic Bloody Mary made with vodka, tomato juice, and spices.
instructions: Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Add vodka and tomato juice.
Squeeze in the juice from a lemon wedge.
Add a pinch of celery salt, black pepper, and hot sauce.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a celery stalk, a lemon wedge, and a green olive.

cocktails.name: Classic Gin and Tonic
cocktails.description: A refreshing and classic gin and tonic made with gin, tonic water, and lime.
instructions: Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Add gin and tonic water.
Squeeze in the juice from a lime wedge.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Margarita on the Rocks
cocktails.description: A classic tequila-based cocktail with a tart and refreshing flavor.
instructions: Rub the rim of a chilled margarita glass with the lime wedge, and dip the rim of the glass into the salt to coat.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour the tequila, lime juice, and triple sec over the ice; stir.
Garnish with the lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Spiced Apple Cider Cocktail
cocktails.description: A warm and cozy cocktail perfect for chilly autumn evenings.
instructions: Combine apple cider, rum, and maple syrup in a small saucepan.
Add cinnamon stick, allspice, and cloves.
Simmer over medium heat for 10 minutes.
Remove from heat and let cool slightly.
Strain into a mug and serve.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.description: Sipping on a Long Island Iced Tea is like taking a boozy trip to the beach without ever leaving your home.
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour vodka, rum, gin, tequila, triple sec, and sour mix over ice; cover and shake.
Pour cocktail into a Collins or hurricane glass; top with splash of cola for color.
Garnish with a lemon slice.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce sweet and sour mix
1 fluid ounce cola, or to taste

cocktails.name: Limoncello Moscow Mule
cocktails.description: Experience a tangy twist on the classic Moscow Mule with this Limoncello Moscow Mule recipe.
instructions: Fill a copper mule mug with ice.
Add lime juice, limoncello, and vodka; stir to combine.
Top with ginger beer.
Lightly stir again and garnish with lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Screwdriver Cocktail
cocktails.description: The Screwdriver Cocktail is a classic and simple vodka-based drink that represents the perfect marriage of sweet and sour flavors.
instructions: Combine orange juice and vodka in a highball glass and stir to combine. Add ice

cocktails.name: Sex on the Beach
cocktails.description: Sex on the Beach is a classic cocktail that is known for its fruity and refreshing taste. This cocktail is perfect for sipping on a hot summer day while lounging on the beach or by the pool. The orange peel slice and maraschino cherries add a pop of color and flavor to the drink, making it a visually appealing option for any occasion.
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, pour in vodka and peach schnapps.
Add in orange juice and cranberry juice.
Garnish and enjoy!

cocktails.name: Mimosa
cocktails.description: This Mimosa is a classic brunch cocktail made with orange juice and champagne. The perfect brunch time drink
instructions: Divide orange juice evenly into two glasses.
Top with champagne and serve

cocktails.name: French 75
cocktails.description: A classic, hard-hitting refresher with Champagne and gin.
instructions: Chill cocktail shaker and glass (champagne flute or collins glass) in the freezer.
Add ice to shaker.
Pour gin, simple syrup, and lemon juice into shaker. Shake well.
Fill chilled glass half full of ice, then strain cocktail into the glass.
Top with champagne and garnish with a lemon slice.

cocktails.name: Strawberry Bellini
cocktails.description: The Strawberry Bellini is a beautiful and delicious drink that is perfect for brunch, a special occasion, or any time you want to enjoy a refreshing and fruity cocktail.
instructions: Blend 3 cups strawberries, confectioners' sugar, and brandy together in a blender until smooth. Chill in refrigerator for 10 minutes.
Divide the strawberry mixture among 3 champagne flutes; top each with about 1/2 cup sparkling wine; stir.
Garnish each glass with 1 strawberry.

cocktails.name: Pineapple Sunrise Mimosas
cocktails.description: These simple, sweet mimosas with pineapple juice are great for brunch.
instructions: Stir pineapple juice, orange juice, and lime juice together in a large pitcher or punch bowl. Add pineapple, blood orange, and lime slices.
Cover and refrigerate for 2 to 24 hours.
To serve, pour 1/2 cup juice mixture into each glass or champagne flute.
Add 1/4 cup Prosecco per serving.
Slowly drizzle in 1 teaspoon Campari.
Garnish each mimosa with a fresh pineapple or orange slice.
ingredients: 4 slices pineapple , orange slices, for garnish

cocktails.name: Cranberry-Rosemary Prosecco Float
cocktails.description: Indulge in a delightful twist on the classic Prosecco cocktail with the Cranberry-Rosemary Prosecco Float - a sweet and herbal concoction that will leave your taste buds craving for more.
instructions: Combine water, sugar, and rosemary leaves in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, stirring until sugar dissolves. Reduce heat to low; let simmer for 1 minute. Remove from heat and let syrup steep, about 30 minutes.
Strain syrup into a sterilized glass jar. Cover and refrigerate until completely chilled, at least 20 minutes.
Drop sorbet into the bottom of a champagne flute.
Pour 1 fluid ounce rosemary syrup and gin on top. Pour in Prosecco very slowly so that it does not overflow.
Garnish with 1 cranberry and sprig of rosemary.

cocktails.name: Peach Sangria
cocktails.description: Sip on sunshine with this sparkling Peach Sangria - a perfect blend of fresh peaches, white wine, and triple sec liqueur, chilled to perfection!
instructions: Blend peaches, hot water, brown sugar, and cinnamon in a blender or food processor until smooth. Transfer to a pitcher.
Stir in dry white wine and triple sec. Cover and chill in refrigerator for at least 4 hours.
Strain peach mixture through a large cheesecloth-lined sieve; Squeeze cloth to remove all the juices.
Pour juice into a large pitcher; stir in sparkling white wine.
ingredients: 4 large fresh peaches, peeled, pitted, and sliced.
1 (750 milliliter) bottle sparkling white wine, chilled

ourPicks.name: Tonkatsu
ourPicks.description: Japanese breaded and deep-fried pork cutlet served with a tangy sauce.
instructions: Pound 2 boneless pork loin chops until they are about 1/4 inch thick. Season them with salt and pepper.
Prepare three shallow bowls: one with all-purpose flour, one with beaten eggs, and one with panko breadcrumbs.
Coat the pork chops in flour, then dip them in beaten eggs, and finally coat them with panko breadcrumbs, pressing lightly to adhere.
Heat vegetable oil in a deep pan or skillet over medium-high heat.
Carefully place the breaded pork chops in the hot oil and fry for about 4-5 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and cooked through.
Remove the pork chops from the oil and drain on a paper towel to remove excess oil.
Slice the tonkatsu into strips and serve with shredded cabbage and steamed rice.
Drizzle tonkatsu sauce (a tangy and sweet sauce) over the pork cutlets or serve it on the side.
Enjoy the crispy and flavorful tonkatsu!

ourPicks.name: Sichuan Dan Dan Noodles
ourPicks.description: Sichuan Dan Dan Noodles are a popular street food in China known for their bold and spicy flavors. The dish features noodles tossed in a savory and spicy sauce, topped with ground meat, peanuts, and green onions. It is a delicious and satisfying main course option.
instructions: Cook the noodles according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, black vinegar, sesame oil, Sichuan peppercorn oil, sugar, and chili oil. Set aside.
In a wok or large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the ground pork and cook until browned and cooked through. Break up the pork into small pieces while cooking.
Add the minced garlic, minced ginger, and chopped scallions to the wok. Stir-fry for about 1 minute until fragrant.
Add the sauce mixture to the wok and stir to combine. Cook for another 2-3 minutes until the sauce thickens slightly.
Add the cooked noodles to the wok and toss to coat them in the sauce.
Divide the noodles into serving bowls. Top with chopped peanuts, sliced cucumber, and additional chopped scallions.
Serve the Sichuan Dan Dan Noodles hot and enjoy!
ingredients: 8 oz ground pork or substitute with ground chicken or beef

ourPicks.name: Fish Tacos
ourPicks.description: A delicious and refreshing Mexican dish consisting of crispy battered fish, topped with tangy slaw and served in warm tortillas.
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine the shredded cabbage, sliced red onion, chopped cilantro, lime juice, mayonnaise, and sour cream. Toss well to coat. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Set aside to let the flavors meld.
In a shallow dish, whisk together the all-purpose flour, cornstarch, baking powder, salt, and black pepper.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the beer and egg. Gradually pour the wet mixture into the dry mixture, whisking until smooth and well combined.

Pat the fish fillets dry with paper towels. Dip each fillet into the batter, allowing any excess to drip off. Fry the battered fish in hot oil until golden brown and crispy, about 3-4 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towels to drain excess oil.
Warm the tortillas in a dry skillet or in the oven until pliable.
To assemble the fish tacos, place a few pieces of fried fish on each tortilla. Top with a generous spoonful of the slaw and garnish with additional cilantro leaves and a squeeze of lime juice.
Serve the fish tacos immediately, and enjoy the delightful combination of flavors and textures!
ingredients: 1 pound white fish fillets (such as cod or tilapia)

favorites.name: Dragon Fruit Mojito
favorites.description: Experience the exotic flavor of dragon fruit with this refreshing Dragon Fruit Mojito recipe, perfect for sipping on a warm summer day!
instructions: Mix 2 tablespoons plus 2 teaspoons sugar with mint in the bottom of a highball glass.
Combine rum and dragon fruit flesh in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour rum mixture over the muddled mint mixture. Stir to incorporate.
Divide mixture between 4 double old-fashioned glasses. Top each drink with equal amounts of club soda.
ingredients: 1 dragon fruit, halved and flesh removed

favorites.name: Tiramisu
favorites.description: Tiramisu is a classic Italian dessert that is loved for its layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and creamy mascarpone filling. This indulgent dessert is often dusted with cocoa powder on top, adding a rich and bittersweet flavor. Tiramisu is a delightful combination of textures and flavors, making it a favorite choice for a sweet ending to an Italian meal.
instructions: In a shallow bowl, combine 1 cup of strong brewed coffee and 2 tablespoons of coffee liqueur.
In a separate bowl, whisk together 3 egg yolks and ½ cup of granulated sugar until the mixture becomes thick and pale yellow in color.
Add 8 ounces of mascarpone cheese to the egg yolk mixture and whisk until well combined and smooth.
In another bowl, beat 1 cup of heavy cream until stiff peaks form.
Gently fold the whipped cream into the mascarpone mixture until fully incorporated.
Dip each ladyfinger into the coffee mixture, ensuring they are soaked but not overly saturated.
Arrange a layer of soaked ladyfingers in a dish or serving glasses.
Spread a layer of the mascarpone cream mixture over the ladyfingers.
Repeat the layers of soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, finishing with a layer of cream on top.
Cover the dish or glasses with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, or overnight if possible.
Before serving, dust the top of the Tiramisu with cocoa powder.
Slice and serve the Tiramisu chilled.
Enjoy your decadent Tiramisu!

favorites.name: Strawberry Mojito
favorites.description: Take your mojito game to the next level with this Strawberry Mojito recipe. Make a big batch for your next summer gathering and get ready to impress your guests!
instructions: Pour about 1/2 inch of sugar onto a small, shallow plate. Run a lime wedge around the rims of 8 cocktail glasses, then dip the rims into sugar to coat; set aside.

Squeeze all of the lime wedges into a sturdy glass pitcher. Toss juiced limes into the pitcher along with mint, strawberries, and 1 cup sugar. Crush with a muddler to release strawberry juice and mint oil. Stir in club soda and rum until sugar has dissolved.
Pour into the prepared glasses over ice cubes to serve.
